name: Frozen Peanut Butter Pie
author: Donna Menz

ingredients.name: of an 8 oz. cream cheese, softened

instructions: Whip softened cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in powdered sugar and peanut butter. Gradually add milk, blending well. Fold in Cool Whip and freeze until firm. Garnish with additional Cool Whip or peanut butter cups.
